That's right."},{"lineNumber":21202,"originalJapaneseLine":"　報酬は飴ちゃん3個でどうでしょう」","translatedEnglishLine":"How about three candies as payment?\""},{"lineNumber":21203,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あいあい…………てやぷー」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Aye aye... teypu!\""},{"lineNumber":21204,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………ッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...........!\""},{"lineNumber":21205,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":21206,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":21207,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふむう。そろそろ帰りますヨー。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm. It's about time to go home."},{"lineNumber":21208,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まだ終わらない人はお持ち帰りにしなサーイ」","translatedEnglishLine":"If you're not done yet, take it home with you.\""},{"lineNumber":21209,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":21210,"originalJapaneseLine":"　　＜ジャリ……＞","translatedEnglishLine":"   <Crunch...>"},{"lineNumber":21211,"originalJapaneseLine":"「んん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm?\""},{"lineNumber":21212,"originalJapaneseLine":"背後から、砂を踏む音がした。","translatedEnglishLine":"From behind, the sound of sand being stepped on was heard."},{"lineNumber":21213,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":21214,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がばッ……！？　か、がぼ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gaba...!? Ka, kabo...\""},{"lineNumber":21215,"originalJapaneseLine":"自らを貫く刃を眺めながら、魔物隊長は絶命した。","translatedEnglishLine":"The monster captain, staring at the blade piercing him, breathed his last."},{"lineNumber":21216,"originalJapaneseLine":"「げっ！　た、隊長！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Geh! C-Captain!?\""},{"lineNumber":21217,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、なんだ！　誰――――」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-What! Who―――\""},{"lineNumber":21218,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"......................\""},{"lineNumber":21219,"originalJapaneseLine":"そこに立っていたのは、勇者。","translatedEnglishLine":"The one standing there was the Hero."},{"lineNumber":21220,"originalJapaneseLine":"剣の一振りで魔の悉くを滅する、世界を断つ刃。","translatedEnglishLine":"A blade that with a single swing destroys all evil, a sword that severs the world."},{"lineNumber":21221,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な、なんだこいつ……！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-What is this guy...!"},{"lineNumber":21222,"originalJapaneseLine":"　人間が！　捻り殺して――――」","translatedEnglishLine":"A human! Twisting and killing――\""},

{"lineNumber":21223,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へ……………へ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"He... he?\""},{"lineNumber":21224,"originalJapaneseLine":"隣の仲間が、声も上げられずに倒れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The comrade beside him collapsed without even making a sound."},{"lineNumber":21225,"originalJapaneseLine":"首のあった場所から流れる血がブーツを濡らして、","translatedEnglishLine":"The blood flowing from where the neck had been soaked his boots,"},{"lineNumber":21226,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物兵は初めて仲間の死を知覚した。","translatedEnglishLine":"The monster soldier became aware of their comrade's death for the first time."},{"lineNumber":21227,"originalJapaneseLine":"「な――――なんだ！　なんなんだてめぇ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-What! What the hell are you!?"},{"lineNumber":21228,"originalJapaneseLine":"　た、ただの人間風情が――」","translatedEnglishLine":"Y-You're just a mere human—\""},

{"lineNumber":21229,"originalJapaneseLine":"ころりと、初めから繋がっていなかったかのような","translatedEnglishLine":"With a smoothness as if it had never been connected from the beginning,"},

{"lineNumber":21230,"originalJapaneseLine":"滑らかさで、首が落ちた。","translatedEnglishLine":"the head fell off."},

{"lineNumber":21231,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なっ、ひ、あ…………っ……！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wha, hi, ah...!\""},{"lineNumber":21232,"originalJapaneseLine":"　お、おい、魔法兵……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"H-Hey, magic soldier...!\""},{"lineNumber":21233,"originalJapaneseLine":"飛び出した魔法兵が、集団で魔法を放とうと構え……","translatedEnglishLine":"The magic soldiers who rushed out prepared to cast magic together..."},{"lineNumber":21234,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――――――ッ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"――――――!\""},{"lineNumber":21235,"originalJapaneseLine":"一瞬で間合いを詰められて、一人が首を刎ねられる。","translatedEnglishLine":"In an instant, the distance was closed and one had their neck sliced off."},{"lineNumber":21236,"originalJapaneseLine":"構わず撃ち込まれた魔法は、","translatedEnglishLine":"The magic fired recklessly,"},{"lineNumber":21237,"originalJapaneseLine":"倒された魔法兵が盾に使われ、阻まれて――","translatedEnglishLine":"was blocked, using the fallen magic soldiers as shields—"},{"lineNumber":21238,"originalJapaneseLine":"残りの魔法兵も、全てが斬り殺される。","translatedEnglishLine":"the remaining magic soldiers were all cut down."},{"lineNumber":21239,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひっ、あ、か…………っ、だ、だめだ……！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hik, a, ka... no, no good...!"},{"lineNumber":21240,"originalJapaneseLine":"　にげっ、逃げろッ…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"Run, run away...!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 僕が……力を、持ち得た者が……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I... the one who has acquired power...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 義務を、果たさないから……こう、なった……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because I didn't fulfill my duty... this is what happened...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「頼む……頼む、コーラ……！」
「はーあぁ。わっかりましたよ。わかりました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haaah. Alright, I got it. I understand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やれやれ……」
「セラクロラス、お願いします。
アリオスを若返らせてください。
ちょぴっとでいいです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just a little bit is fine."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おいーっす？」
「アリオス。ですよ。
報酬は飴ちゃん3個でどうでしょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How about three candies as payment?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あいあい…………てやぷー」
「ふむう。そろそろ帰りますヨー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm. It's about time to go home.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ終わらない人はお持ち帰りにしなサーイ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you're not done yet, take it home with you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ジャリ……＞
「んん？」
背後から、砂を踏む音がした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From behind, the sound of sand being stepped on was heard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がばッ……！？　か、がぼ……」
自らを貫く刃を眺めながら、魔物隊長は絶命した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster captain, staring at the blade piercing him, breathed his last.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「げっ！　た、隊長！？」
そこに立っていたのは、勇者。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The one standing there was the Hero.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 剣の一振りで魔の悉くを滅する、世界を断つ刃。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A blade that with a single swing destroys all evil, a sword that severs the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、なんだこいつ……！
人間が！　捻り殺して――――」
隣の仲間が、声も上げられずに倒れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The comrade beside him collapsed without even making a sound.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 首のあった場所から流れる血がブーツを濡らして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The blood flowing from where the neck had been soaked his boots,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵は初めて仲間の死を知覚した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster soldier became aware of their comrade's death for the first time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な――――なんだ！　なんなんだてめぇ！
た、ただの人間風情が――」
ころりと、初めから繋がっていなかったかのような
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a smoothness as if it had never been connected from the beginning,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 滑らかさで、首が落ちた。
お、おい、魔法兵……！」
飛び出した魔法兵が、集団で魔法を放とうと構え……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The magic soldiers who rushed out prepared to cast magic together...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一瞬で間合いを詰められて、一人が首を刎ねられる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In an instant, the distance was closed and one had their neck sliced off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 構わず撃ち込まれた魔法は、
倒された魔法兵が盾に使われ、阻まれて――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was blocked, using the fallen magic soldiers as shields—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残りの魔法兵も、全てが斬り殺される。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the remaining magic soldiers were all cut down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひっ、あ、か…………っ、だ、だめだ……！
にげっ、逃げろッ…………」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 僕が……力を、持ち得た者が……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I... the one who has acquired power...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 義務を、果たさないから……こう、なった……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Because I didn't fulfill my duty... this is what happened...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「頼む……頼む、コーラ……！」
「はーあぁ。わっかりましたよ。わかりました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Haaah. Alright, I got it. I understand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やれやれ……」
「セラクロラス、お願いします。
アリオスを若返らせてください。
ちょぴっとでいいです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just a little bit is fine."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おいーっす？」
「アリオス。ですよ。
報酬は飴ちゃん3個でどうでしょう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How about three candies as payment?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あいあい…………てやぷー」
「ふむう。そろそろ帰りますヨー。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm. It's about time to go home.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ終わらない人はお持ち帰りにしなサーイ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you're not done yet, take it home with you."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＜ジャリ……＞
「んん？」
背後から、砂を踏む音がした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From behind, the sound of sand being stepped on was heard.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がばッ……！？　か、がぼ……」
自らを貫く刃を眺めながら、魔物隊長は絶命した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster captain, staring at the blade piercing him, breathed his last.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「げっ！　た、隊長！？」
そこに立っていたのは、勇者。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The one standing there was the Hero.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 剣の一振りで魔の悉くを滅する、世界を断つ刃。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A blade that with a single swing destroys all evil, a sword that severs the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、なんだこいつ……！
人間が！　捻り殺して――――」
隣の仲間が、声も上げられずに倒れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The comrade beside him collapsed without even making a sound.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 首のあった場所から流れる血がブーツを濡らして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The blood flowing from where the neck had been soaked his boots,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵は初めて仲間の死を知覚した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster soldier became aware of their comrade's death for the first time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な――――なんだ！　なんなんだてめぇ！
た、ただの人間風情が――」
ころりと、初めから繋がっていなかったかのような
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With a smoothness as if it had never been connected from the beginning,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 滑らかさで、首が落ちた。
お、おい、魔法兵……！」
飛び出した魔法兵が、集団で魔法を放とうと構え……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The magic soldiers who rushed out prepared to cast magic together...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一瞬で間合いを詰められて、一人が首を刎ねられる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In an instant, the distance was closed and one had their neck sliced off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 構わず撃ち込まれた魔法は、
倒された魔法兵が盾に使われ、阻まれて――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was blocked, using the fallen magic soldiers as shields—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 残りの魔法兵も、全てが斬り殺される。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the remaining magic soldiers were all cut down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひっ、あ、か…………っ、だ、だめだ……！
にげっ、逃げろッ…………」
